mention.text: Re phtas imisa Botswana , which translates as ` We make Botswana sparkle '
the richest diamond mine in the world
present being completed three months ahead of schedule and under budget
the underground development that would not otherwise be mined because of the dangers involved
the South African group that dominates world trade in rough -LRB- uncut -RRB- diamonds
the company that owns the Jwaneng mine
its control of at least 50 per cent of world diamond production
the other producers who have marketing contracts with De Beers ' Central Selling Organisation
The value of Jwaneng to Botswana
the kimberlite pipe containing the diamonds when actually they were looking for asbestos - is one of the victims of the present turmoil in the diamond market
